channel.title: ::command menu
channel.description:
Any1 got a ::commands menu? Just give me one ima change :)
Will Rep :)

item.title: ::command menu
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“mrrules, post:5, topic:160787”] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandhelp")) { commandHelp(); }

public void commandHelp() { sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8147); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

That what you looking for?[/quote]

Here

public void commandHelp() { sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8148); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8154); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8157); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8158); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8159); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8160); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8161); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8162); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8163); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8164); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8165); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::command menu

item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandhelp")) { commandHelp(); }

public void commandHelp() { sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Write the commands here", 8147); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

That what you looking for?

Read full topic

item.title: ::command menu
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

gimme a sec, ill put 1 on here [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2007, 06:20:14 PM[/size][hr]public void commands()//Start Of commands { sendQuest("Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("your message", 8147); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } and to add more to that, just make another line

sendQuest("your message", NEXTLINE*ex: 8148*);

then add a command like…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { commands(); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::command menu

item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“mrrules, post:2, topic:160787”]What do you mean by command menu?

Like when you type ::menu a menu comes up?[/quote]

Nope like you write ::commands
and gives you a list of commands on the server
